items.name: Soul Catcher
explicitMods: 70% increased Critical Strike Chance with Vaal Skills during effect
80% increased Damage with Vaal Skills during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have 10% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.
<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ghost}

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Kalandra's Touch
flavourText: On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 21% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Bramble Bite
implicitMods: Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
explicitMods: 29% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows
Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
24% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
craftedMods: Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Sadima's Touch
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Movement, Lightning, Travel

socketedItems.secDescrText: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and your movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to. Casting again will queue up multiple teleportations to occur in sequence.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +16% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Glyph Guide
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Area of Effect per 4% Quality
implicitMods: Enemies you Kill have a 25% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Physical Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors
craftedMods: Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers
+2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 13% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, making their effect reoccur when cast. Cannot support skills with cooldowns, triggered skills, Brand skills, Vaal skills, channelling skills, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 10% increased Spell Damage

Supported Spells gain a Seal every 0.66 seconds, to a maximum of 4 Seals
Supported Spells are Unsealed when cast, and their effects Reoccur for each Seal lost
Supported Skills deal 38% less Damage when Reoccurring

socketedItems.secDescrText: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.

Can have up to 10 active spinning blades
10% increased Critical Strike Chance for each blade

items.name: Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 29% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Vaal, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention

39% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 20% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 10000

Reflects 9000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage each second,
or when Buff expires or is depleted
hybrid.secDescrText: Applies a buff that raises your armour, and takes some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Each second, the skill deals reflected damage to surrounding enemies based on the damage taken by the buff in that second. When the buff is removed, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken by the buff. You cannot have the buff at the same time as any other Guard skill.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +16% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Lavianga's Spirit
explicitMods: Skills Cost no Mana during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "When the Ancestors fill your cup,
It is only good manners to drink your fill."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom
